lead_paragraph: The chairman of the English Football Association questioned the credentials of Sheikh Salman bin Ebrahim al-Khalifa of Bahrain,a leading candidate for the FIFA presidency.
snippet: The chairman of the English Football Association questioned the credentials of Sheikh Salman bin Ebrahim al-Khalifa of Bahrain,a leading candidate for the FIFA presidency.
abstract: English Football Assn chairman Greg Dyke questions credentials of Asian Football Confederation president Sheikh Salman bin Ebrahim al-Khalifa of Bahrian, leading candidate for FIFA presidency.
